name: Softspace
detailed_description:
Softspace is a spatial thinking tool for creative individuals and teams.


Build beautiful virtual project spaces where you can organize, develop, and communicate your best ideas. Find out more at http://www.softspace.io.

Designed For Creative Workflows



Research
Build yourself a mood space so you’re never short on inspiration. Softspace’s built-in web browser and Dropbox integration let you collect and organize references quickly, easily, and spatially.

Ideation
Jump into Softspace for your next brainstorming or whiteboarding session. Flexible sketching and annotation tools let you express ideas in ways that are only possible in virtual reality.

Design Development
Softspace supports a wide (and growing) range of 2D and 3D content. Hold your next design review or planning meeting in Softspace, and get the feedback and buy-in you need to bring your vision to life.

Social & Spatial, Just Like You



Co-Presence
Skip the video call, and step into the same space instead. Avatars and spatial audio let you communicate with clarity, subtlety, and precision—whether you’re a desk apart, or an ocean apart.

Spatial Thinking
Softspace’s fully 3D interface is designed to leverage your powers of spatial memory and creative thinking. Escape the cramped confines of your computer monitor, and harness your whole brain.

Focus
You need beautiful surroundings to make beautiful things. Softspace’s architectural environments promote comfort and deep work, helping you tune out the noise and concentrate on your project.

short_description: Softspace is a spatial thinking tool for creative individuals and teams. Build beautiful virtual project spaces where you can organize, develop, and communicate your best ideas. Find out more at www.softspace.io.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 5 1700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
